Texts.Eng: Adako told me to expect you. I can open that relic for you.

The tool uses a Xanafian Shard as its power source, so you'll need to find a new one. ^green;Find some ruins of the Old Ones^reset;, and hopefully you'll find a ^orange;Centensian Relic^reset; - a small hovering cube - which should contain a Shard. Bring it to Vanhas - he'll know how to extract the Shard once you have the relic.
